titleStmt.title: Official notice of a cession of cleruchic land : draft or copy.
titleStmt.author: Spasines

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Spasines and Apollophanes to Dionusios and Asklepiades, greeting. Whereas Kastor son of Apollonios of the Ammonian deme, hipparches in command of men of the first hipparchy of the 80-arouras holders, has ceded out of the remainder of his holding at Kerkesis in the division of Polemon 6 1/2 arouras to Akousilaos son of Maron, Macedonian ï¿½ , we write to you in order that you may be careful to manage the other formalities, as is fitting. Good-bye. The [.]1st year, Epeiph [..].

listBibl.bibl: P.Tebt., II.382 (lines 28-41) On date, see BL 3, p. 242; on line 40 see BL v. 5, p. 147.
